name: 2020: THE RIDE (itch)
description:
Introducing 2020: THE RIDE, a year in review in the form of the world’s scariest VR roller coaster. When the economy drops, you drop. When Covid-19 rates speed up, you speed up. Travel through natural disasters, protests and political turmoil in a ride you’ll never forget (no matter how badly you wish you could). 

2020theride.com
